duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide end-user support for technical issues internally.
Troubleshoot and find solutions to technical problems via ticketing system.
Diagnose and troubleshoot complex problems and work to a resolution.
Create, change, and delete user accounts (e.g., Active Directory).
Maintain a high level of customer service to end-users.
Coordinate timely repair of equipment covered by third party vendors or warranty.
Document all work done in the ticketing system.
Perform routine system administration activities such as resetting passwords, printer set-ups, user accounts, and accessibility.
